sentence: As Democrats, we have got to get better at speaking up and using our voices,? Aiken said in a video announcing his candidacy, noting that far-right figures like Reps. Madison Cawthorn (R-N.C.) and Marjorie Taylor Greene (R-Ga.) ain't quieting down anytime soon.? If the loudest and most hateful voices think they're gonna speak for us, just tell them I'm warming up the old vocal chords.? If elected, Aiken would be the first openly gay congressman from the South, he said in his campaign video.
author: Alison Durkee
title: American Idol' Star Clay Aiken Running For Congress In North Carolina
